Package fr.uga.miage.pc.dilemme.back

Class ApiDilemme

java.lang.Object
fr.uga.miage.pc.dilemme.back.ApiDilemme
public final class ApiDilemme
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used like an API, it give the possibilty to the front class to call the method of the back-end
Since:
3.0

    • createTournoi

      public static Tournoi createTournoi​(java.util.List<IStrategie> strategies, int nbTours) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.Exception
      Parameters:
      strategies - List of strategies for the tournament
      nbTours - Number of round per Confrontation
      Returns:
      Tournoi - The tournament created
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the list of strategies is null
      java.lang.Exception - If the user doesn't give at least one Strategie
      Since:
      3.0
      See Also:
